title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a built-in model library and OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, distributed on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) providing LLM, embeddings, and chat interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed ‘Open WebUI’) with chat history, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, chat sessions, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight Retrieval-Augmented Generation plugin for Ollama using ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of curl snippets and Bash scripts showing how to use the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community-maintained meta-repo listing unofficial SDKs for Go, Ruby, PHP, Swift, etc.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a reproducible dev/test service in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin enabling AI-assisted writing and summarization via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into chat channels with slash commands.
